reviews.title: Yummy chocolate
reviews.review_text: Ordered it in June for a chocolate craving for Russell Stover's chocolates . It was a Valentines Day box but happily surprised chocolate was in good shape and delicious ü•∞ and a GREAT price üëç
This is a very good box of chocolates!! I always love the Russell brand of candy! And the box was bigger than I expected so it was worth the value and price. Always a perfect gift for someone!
Even though these are Valentine chocolates, they are delicious and chewy!
well. it had expired a month ago and it had a powdered look to it.

reviews.title: Previously Frozen and Dry
reviews.review_text: I ordered two of these and though I love boxed candy, these were dry inside and looked like they had been frozen because of discoloration of the chocolate on the outside. Valentine's Day was months ago so I should've figured. Maybe I'll buy them again -- next February!
This was chocolate and should have been in a chilled delivery truck. When I received it was melted and even after refrigeration was white and the quality was gone.

reviews.title: don't buy it
reviews.review_text: If a company ships chocolate in July, they should make sure it doesn't arrive completely melted.
very out dated. probably last years. dried out, hard, way past expiration time..
This order was never received, and nobody would reply to my comments!

reviews.title: Delicious But Melted
reviews.review_text: Ordered wrong time of the year. Candy had melted. Order during cold months only.

reviews.title: Always Delicious, consistent!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I've always loved Russell Stover chocolates, even as a child many years ago. The quality of the chocolates, the flavors in the assortment and the aesthetically pleasing packaging was very satisfying and met my high expectations for this brand.

reviews.title: Delicious little luxury in a heart shaped box
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I received this box of Russell Stover chocolate candy from Influenster in exchange for my honest review. Nothing says treat more than a heart shaped box of candy. Russell Stover is a trusted brand that has been around for ever. I enjoyed the variety of bite sized chocolates. The quality is great as always.

reviews.title: Great Valentines Chocolates!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] These chocolates are the highlight of my valentines, they always taste great and are usually gone the second I bring them into the house, I recommend them for anyone who has a sweet tooth around valentines or wants to brighten up someone's day!

reviews.title: Tastes good
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Russell Stover's is a good value when you want to send an inexpensive gift to a lot of people over the holidays, or just to a few people who to let them know you're thinking of them. There aren't any flavors that really stand out, but it's decent quality, and it's chocolate.

reviews.title: A Valentines Day stable since I was little
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] At this point, I don't know who hasn't tried these. I picked these up every single Valentine's Day and received them ever since I was just a little girl. There's really nothing bad I can say besides a lot of sugar, but if you're eating chocolate, shouldn't be a problem for you. I will continue buying these forever. If you haven't bought it yet, I don't know what you're waiting for. Highly recommend! My fav is nut caramel.

reviews.title: Tastes Like Chocolate!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Received an assortment of chocolate courtesy of Influenster to sample. 7 pieces, 6 flavors. Nothing to write home about - tastes like chocolate! There was caramel, peanut cluster, strawberry creme, nut caramel, vanilla creme and chocolate butter creme. Mix of milk and dark chocolate. Presentation-wise = nice. Nothing to hate on. Comparable to fancy chocolate. Taste-wise = average. Sometimes chocolate just doesn't taste high-quality and plastic-y, which this one reminded me of. It wasn't horrible - just tasted like cheap grocery store chocolate. But as most chocolate eaters would probably agree in - chocolate is chocolate - can't really mess it up and even bad chocolate tastes like chocolate. These would be a good gift for kiddos on valentines. Or to go along with another gift. They all tasted very similar for the most part. Very sweet and sugary. Size for price could be a lot better. But overall - just your average box or chocolates.

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I have always thought these boxes were expensive for how much chocolate you get, so that is why I was really exited to see this offer! I overall do think they are very good. My favorite was the vanilla creme!

reviews.title: Yummy Valentine's chocolates in a beautiful box
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] These assorted chocolates for Valentine's Day come in a beautifully wrapped package that is small enough to fit under someone's pillow. The chocolates are tasty and not too sweet with some nice variety of flavors. Ôøº

reviews.title: good simple chocolate
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] these chocolates are good but nothing too amazing. they're good for simple chocolate lovers but there were some flavors that i didn't love. i do like how it tells you exactly which is which.

reviews.title: Anniversary candy
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I don't do Valentine's day, however I have bought these for a friend's anniversary, and have been giving them for my anniversary . The texture of the candy is good. They were fresh like the heart.

reviews.title: Yummy chocolate!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I absolutely love these chocolates! They have great, yummy flavors! It's the perfect gift to get someone for the holidays! The packaging is super cute too!

reviews.title: Cutest little box
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The caramel and chocolate butter cream in this are my favorite! Russell Stover is a go-to for me because their boxes are so cute and they always taste fresh!

reviews.title: Great chocolate
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Great candy and always a reliable with taste . The box was pretty , easy to open and fresh . The candy was very delicious and was a joy in my home . I highly recommend

reviews.title: Get these yummy chocolates
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Loves these candies. Right in time for valentines. Tastes delicious. Fresh as always. Best price In town. Go out and get yall some. Can't go wrong with chocolate

reviews.title: Too cute and yum!!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] So yum!! Tastes amazing and melts like butter in the mouth! I love how soft and rich the chocolate is and the packaging is cute!! My favorite was the caramel!

reviews.title: Great Valentines gift!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Love this box of heart chocolates. It's a great size and you get 7 different flavors. All are really good. This is perfect for a gift. I will be gifting these to my coworkers.

reviews.title: Delicious Chocolates!
reviews.review_text: Russell Stover is by far the best chocolate Heart to give your special someone!
Same price as it would be on valentines ‚Ä¶I guess they think we're dumb

reviews.title: Hello
reviews.review_text: The Valentine candy is for the bus driver or SCHOOL

reviews.title: Love the red heart
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Mouth watering Russell Stover assorted milk and dark chocolates perfect gift for any occasion there is so many choices to choose from I like them all there is peanut cluster and chocolate butter cream just to name a few oh and Valentines is coming up (HINT HINT) Enjoy !

reviews.title: Delicious
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] These are so incredibly good. I love all the different types of chocolates inside. My favorite is the strawberry filled chocolate and the one with caramel inside so insanely delicious. Also love the symmetry on how they arrange them.

reviews.title: Great variety
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I love these chocolates because they have a variety of different flavors. I like the mix of dark and milk chocolates. There was a nice selection of caramel filled chocolates and ones with cr√®me fillings. I kinda wish it had more with nuts but still these are such a cute gift for Valentine's Day.

reviews.title: Great assortment
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I love Russell Stover chocolates and I like the milk and dark chocolate assortments the best .This package says new and improved assortment and I gotta say these are so good! My favorite of the new assortment is the caramel and nut caramel.this assortment does not have one in the assortment that I do not like which for me there is usually at least one chocolate I don't like, not this assortment though I love them all . Of course they still have the freshness and quality you expect with Russel Stover,Thanks

reviews.title: Better chocolate out there
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] First, the product box arrived broken, making it impossible to put the lid back on once opened. Variety is good, but the quality of the chocolate and filings are lacking. Creams are too sweet, caramels are too hard, and just overall I feel the quality has gone down over the years.

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] My family loved this chocolates it has been favorite for years rich chocolate amazing taste on it makes my valentines gift every year super special I can have this chocolate everyday if I could don't judge me just love the taste

reviews.title: A Delicious Mystery?
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I liked that this box had an assortment of flavors, though I was curious as to why they included two strawberry flavored ones in the box instead of finding one other chocolate flavor to include, even if it was milk chocolate ‚Äî I liked the variety for such a small box. My main concern was that the list of chocolates was only printed on a sticker attached to the wrapper and not anywhere on the box, I had to keep the wrapper with the box until I finished it. I don't mind the flavor being a surprise at first, but I do like knowing what flavor it is after biting into it ‚Äî I shouldn't have to keep the wrapper just for that.

reviews.title: Great Gift
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This is the perfect gift for a special someone this Valentine's Day. The assortment includes creams, chews, and nuts covered in delicious milk and dark chocolate. I was very impressed with the quality and taste!

reviews.title: Perfect for Valentines Day!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Very tasty chocolates from Russell Stover. I have a preference for milk chocolate, especially with nuts. I'm not too big a fan of the cream filled ones but that goes across the board with any box of chocolates. Your mileage may vary. Overall, a good product.

reviews.title: Great Chocolate
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The Russell Stover assorted red foil heart comes with a nice array of delicious chocolates. It includes 7 chocolates in 6 different flavors. Creamy, chewy and crunchy all packaged up in a cute heart. Perfect gift for your girls and boys!!! I recommend this product for anyone with a sweet tooth!

reviews.title: Pretty Heart Chocolates
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] These Russell Stover assorted chocolates are great for Valentines Day. As with all Russell Stover chocolates they are delicious and this is a nice size. It gives you a sample of the best flavors caramel, peanut cluster, strawberry creme, nut. Caramel, vanilla creme, and chocolate butter cream.

reviews.title: The perfect box
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I can be very picky with my chocolates, but I am pleasantly impressed with this box. It was fresh, rich, and just the right amount of sweet treats to satisfy. I will definitely be looking out for more of these in the future.

reviews.title: So good
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] These chocolates are so yummy . There is something for everyone and the chocolates are rich and satisfying I love all the flavors and there is enough in the box . I love chocolates and these are great for an afternoon pick me up or a snack or for whichever you choose.

reviews.title: Good way to show your love
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Me and my son loves chocolates. Having this to share made us so happy. Every flavor is such an exquisite experience and a tickle in your tastebuds. This is a great way to show your love and sweetness to your special someone.

reviews.title: Smooth and Creamy
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This was a smaller box. The cherry flavor really popped along with the strawberry and of course the nuts were the best. A small box with only 6 chocolates but that is all you need. Russell's never lets you down.

reviews.title: Taste Great!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] These will make a perfect Valentine's gift. The assorted chocolates were delicious. The box comes wrapped in a pretty red packaging. There is a flavor guide on the back of the package making it easy to choose your favorites.

reviews.title: Chocolate Dream
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This small assorted chocolate heart box from Russell Stover is delicious. Each piece was so fresh and mouth watering tasty. Perfect size for one or a small gift for another. The outer foil covering adds to the beauty of this box. When unwrapped there is an image of a rose on the top, which is lovely. Would recommend for someone you love or for a thank you gift.

reviews.title: Delicious!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Russel Stover has done it yet again this year with their assorted chocolate red foil heart. The variety of chocolate is delish, and there was something for everyone in my family, even my children who like standard chocolates, and me who prefers the dark chocolate. The strawberry one was delicious as well. The packing is lovely and would make for a great gift. The chocolates stay nice and safe in their little cutouts, and the box keeps them from getting hard or discoloring. Overall, a delicious treat.

reviews.title: Great quality chocolates!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The Russell Stover assorted milk and dark chocolates are great quality chocolates! From the moment you place them in your mouth, you will be glad you purchased them. I really enjoyed the nut caramel and vanilla creme flavors while my wife enjoyed the strawberry creme and chocolate butter cream chocolates. Very delicious!

reviews.title: So much GREAT taste in one box
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I bought this box of chocolates because of the variety of flavors but went back and bought 5 more because of the homemade taste. This is a must have based on price and and tastes, the person who you get this for will not be disappointed.

reviews.title: Not a fan
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This said assorted chocolates and I was hoping for the cream in the middle I love the raspberry and peach flavors. This didn't have any of those. So I was bummed out. I wish it had said dark chocolate and chocolate only on the box I wouldn't have gotten it. The back label should have that description on it.

reviews.title: A Classic!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Classic Russell Stover assorted chocolates in a red foil heart-shaped box. The red foil heart is imprinted with a rose and the box is wrapped in red cellophane for a great presentation. A small, affordable box of chocolates suitable for friends or family. Yummy dark and milk chocolates. A great-tasting treat.

reviews.title: Russell Stover - best Valentine's Day sampler
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This sampler should be given with every Valentine's Day gift across the country. The Russell Stover chocolate is top notch‚Ä¶the taste is that of high end, and high price point chocolate. The variety in the sampler is a good mix. Everyone will like it.

reviews.title: Simple and Sweet
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This is a pretty small assortment but a nice gift if you looking for something small that looks better than loose wrapped chocolates. Not my favorite compared to more expensive chocolates but works for something to buy coworkers or for my kids to giveaway.

reviews.title: Yummy Chocolates!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] It comes with 6 flavors and 7 pieces of candy. Mine had 2 strawberry cremes and one of everything else. The Strawberry Creme and the Vanilla Creme were my favorites. It liked the amount of chocolates, it was enough to enjoy them all at once, without feeling like I had eaten too many chocolates.

reviews.title: How can it not be good?
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This valentine candy holds 7 pieces of candy. The heart shaped box is solid red with a raised long stemmed rose embossed in the cardboard. The chocolate is absolutely delicious. Who can go wrong with chocolate for a Valentine's Day gift?

reviews.title: Delicious
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] The candy was good but I understood it to be new and improved. I couldn't tell anything different from candy I had bought before.

reviews.title: Best valentines day candy
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This is the candy that I buy for my fiance every year, I started this our first valentines day together. She always looks forward to it every year.

reviews.title: Decent candies.
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I've had this brand candies before and it was what I expected. I enjoyed them and something I would buy when I have sugar cravings.

reviews.title: Addicting!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Classic red foil heart shaped box for Valentine's Day. Love the assorted flavors including dark chocolate, my favorite. Very smooth tasting chocolate! Made in the USA!

reviews.title: Delicious
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This was an assortment of 6 flavors and 7 pieces. The chocolate to filling ratio was just right, and all of the flavors were really nice. Very enjoyable.

reviews.title: Delicious as always
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This sampler is delicious. It has a good variety of options and the taste is spectacular. This was fresh upon arrival and lived up to all my expectations. I highly recommend this product!

reviews.title: Delicious
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This is some delicious chocolate. Super soft and just melts in your mouth. And I love the variety of chocolates that it comes with. Dark chocolate, milk chocolate and much more to choose from.

reviews.title: Delicious
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Great range of chocolates, and super flavorful. Will be a great gift to give, or even a nice little treat for yourself.

reviews.title: Ideal Valentine's gift
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Chocolate is delicious and creamy although I am not a fan of dark chocolate and it brings several, the truth is the ideal Valentine's gift for a friend or our partner, I love it!

reviews.title: Perfect size!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] This box of chocolates came with just the right amount of pieces in it for one person or if you're nice you can share a piece or two! The chocolates were a good assortment of choices.

reviews.title: Great presentation
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Love the presentation of all the boxes just the chocolates could be a little bit better of selection but love them either way for a gift!

reviews.title: Great variety
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] Russell Stover did it again! They delivered the ideal mix of chocolates that made for the perfect gift. It was such a good gift that I had to beg my wife to share!

reviews.title: Yummy!
reviews.review_text: [This review was collected as part of a promotion.] I love this Chocolates! I would definitely recommend
